ui.panel.config.areas.caption: Oblasti
ui.panel.config.areas.description: Group devices and entities into areas
ui.panel.config.areas.picker.introductio: Oblasti se koriste za organizovanje mesta gde se uređaji nalaze. Ove informacije će se koristiti u Home Assistant da bi vam pomogle u organizovanju interfejsa, dozvola i integracija sa drugim sistemima.
Da biste postaviti uređaje u oblast, koristite vezu ispod da biste se kretali do stranice sa integracijama, a zatim kliknite na konfigurisanu integraciju da biste došli do kartica uređaja.
ui.panel.config.areas.picker.no_areas: Izgleda da još uvek nemate oblasti!
ui.panel.config.areas.editor.name: Naziv
ui.panel.config.areas.editor.no_linked_e: Nema entiteta povezanih sa ovom oblašću.
ui.panel.config.areas.editor.aliases_des: Alijasi su alternativna imena koja se koriste u glasovnom asistentu za upućivanje na ovu oblast.
ui.panel.config.areas.delete.confirmatio: Ova oblast će biti trajno izbrisana i svi uređaji koji pripadaju ovoj oblasti postaće neraspoređeni.

ui.panel.config.tag.detail.usage: Tag može da pokrene automatizaciju prilikom skeniranja, možete da koristite NFC oznake, QR kodove ili bilo koju drugu vrstu oznaka. Koristite našu {companion_link} da biste zapisali ovaj tag na programibilni NFC tag ili kreirali QR kôd ispod.
ui.panel.config.energy.caption: Energy
ui.panel.config.energy.description: Monitor your energy production and consumption
ui.panel.config.energy.new_device_info: Nakon podešavanja novog uređaja, može da potraje i do 2 sata da novi podaci stignu na kontrolnu tablu za energiju.
ui.panel.config.energy.delete_source: Želite li zaista da izbrišete ovaj izvor?
ui.panel.config.energy.delete_integratio: Želite li zaista da izbrišete ovu integraciju? Ukloniće entitete koje obezbeđuje
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.title: Electricity grid
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.sub: Configure the amount of energy that you consume from the grid and, if you produce energy, give back to the grid. This allows Home Assistant to track your whole home energy usage.
ui.panel.config.energy.grid.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
Grid consumption is the energy that flows from the energy grid to your home.
Pick a sensor which measures grid consumption in either of {unit}.
Select how Home Assistant should keep track of the costs of the consumed energy.
Use an entity tracking the total costs
Use an entity with current price
Grid production is the energy that flows from your solar panels to the grid.
Pick a sensor which measures grid production in either of {unit}.
Do you get money back when you return energy to the grid?
I do not get money back
Use an entity tracking the total received money
Use an entity with current rate
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.title: Solar Panels
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.sub: Let Home Assistant monitor your solar panels and give you insight on their performance.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_return: Solar energy returned to the grid
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.stat_predic: Prediction of your solar energy production
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.head: Konfigurisanje solarnih panela
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.enti: Pick a sensor which measures solar energy production in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.energy.solar.dialog.sola: Dodavanje informacija o prognozi solarne proizvodnje omogućiće vam da brzo vidite očekivanu proizvodnju za danas.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.title: Skladište kućne baterije
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.sub: Ako imate sistem baterije, možete ga konfigurisati tako da nadgleda koliko je energije uskladišteno i korišćeno iz baterije.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.learn_mor: Više informacija o tome kako da počnete.
ui.panel.config.energy.battery.dialog.en: Pick sensors which measure energy going in to and out of the battery in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.title: Potrošnja gasa
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.sub: Dozvolite Home Assistant-u da nadgleda korišćenje gasa.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.learn_more: Više informacija o tome kako da počnete.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.paragr: Potrošnja gasa je zapremina gasa koja teče ka vašem domu.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.entity: Pick a sensor which measures gas consumption in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.note_p: Note: It is not possible to add both sensors measuring a volume of gas and sensors measuring the amount of energy contained in the gas.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_p: Izaberite kako Home Assistant treba da prati troškove utrošene energije.
ui.panel.config.energy.gas.dialog.cost_s: Korišćenje entiteta koji prati ukupne troškove
ui.panel.config.energy.water.title: Water Consumption
ui.panel.config.energy.water.sub: Let Home Assistant monitor your water usage.
ui.panel.config.energy.water.learn_more: More information on how to get started.
ui.panel.config.energy.water.dialog.head: Configure water consumption
ui.panel.config.energy.water.dialog.para: Water consumption is the volume of water that flows to your home.
ui.panel.config.energy.water.dialog.enti: Pick a sensor which measures water consumption in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.energy.water.dialog.cost: Select how Home Assistant should keep track of the costs of the consumed water.
Use an entity tracking the total costs
Use an entity with current price
ui.panel.config.energy.device_consumptio: Tracking the energy usage of individual devices allows Home Assistant to break down your energy usage by device.
More information on how to get started.
Pick entity to track energy of
Select the energy sensor that measures the device's energy usage in either of {unit}.
ui.panel.config.helpers.caption: Pomagači
ui.panel.config.helpers.picker.no_helper: Looks like you don't have any helpers yet!
ui.panel.config.core.caption: Opšte
ui.panel.config.core.description: Naziv, vremenska zona i lokalna podešavanja
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.core_c: Uređivač je onemogućen zato što je konfiguracija sačuvana u configuration.yaml.
Lokacija se može promeniti u podešavanjima zone
Sistem jedinica je promenjen, a jedinica nekih senzora kao što su udaljenost i brzina se može ažurirati.
Jedinica senzora u kojoj je jedinica uređena iz korisničkog interfejsa ili koja se ne može uređivati iz korisničkog interfejsa neće biti ažurirana.
Napomena: Jedinica senzora temperature se uvek ažurira.
Sistem jedinica je promenjen, a jedinica nekih senzora kao što su udaljenost i brzina će biti ažurirana.
ui.panel.config.url.caption: Home Assistant URL
ui.panel.config.url.description: Konfigurišite adrese Veb lokacije koje Home Assistant treba da deli sa drugim uređajima kada je potrebno da dopreme podatke iz Home Assistant-a (npr. da reprodukuju tekst-u-govor ili druge hostovane medije).
ui.panel.config.url.external_get_ha_clou: Pristup sa bilo kog mesta pomoću Home Assistant oblaka
ui.panel.config.url.ha_cloud_remote_not_: Daljinska veza Home Assistant-a i oblaka trenutno nije omogućena.
ui.panel.config.url.internal_url_https_e: Konfigurisali ste HTTPS sertifikat u Home Assistant-u. To znači da unutrašnju URL adresu treba postaviti na domen koji je pokriven sertifikatom.

ui.panel.config.hardware.reboot_moved_de: Radnje ponovnog pokretanja sistema i isključivanja su premeštene na  stranicu sistema.

ui.panel.config.info.description: Version, loaded integrations and links to documentation
ui.panel.config.info.developed_by: Developed by a bunch of awesome people.
ui.panel.config.info.system_health_error: System Health component is not loaded. Add 'system_health:' to configuration.yaml
ui.panel.config.logs.caption: Logovi
ui.panel.config.logs.description: Prikazivanje i pretraživanje evidencija za dijagnostikovanje problema
ui.panel.config.logs.no_issues_search: Nisu pronađeni problemi za termin za pretragu ''{term}''
ui.panel.config.logs.multiple_messages: poruka se prvi put pojavila u {time} i pojavljuje se {counter} puta
ui.panel.config.logs.error_from_custom_i: Ova greška potiče od prilagođene integracije.
ui.panel.config.lovelace.caption: Kontrolne table
ui.panel.config.lovelace.description: Create customized sets of cards to control your home
ui.panel.config.lovelace.dashboards.conf: Kontrolna tabla će biti trajno izbrisana.
ui.panel.config.lovelace.dashboards.cant: Dashboards created in YAML cannot be edited from the UI. Change them in configuration.yaml.

Postavi kao podrazumevanu vrednost na ovom uređaju

ui.panel.config.lovelace.resources.refre: Morate da osvežite stranicu da biste dovršili uklanjanje. Želite li sada da osvežite?
ui.panel.config.lovelace.resources.cant_: You are using your dashboard in YAML mode, therefore you cannot manage your resources through the UI. Manage them in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.lovelace.resources.detai: Dodavanje resursa može biti opasno, uverite se da znate izvor resursa i da im verujete. Loši resursi mogu ozbiljno da naškode vašem sistemu.
ui.panel.config.voice_assistants.assista: Dajte svom asistentu ime i izaberite jezik. U zavisnosti od odabranog jezika, bićete u moćnosti da odaberete dole navedene varijante specifične za region.
Agent za razgovor je mozak vašeg asistenta i obradiće dolazne tekstualne komande.
Kada kontrolišete pomoćnika glasom, mehanizam govor-u-tekst pretvara vašu glasovnu komandu u tekst.
Kada kontrolišete pomoćnika glasom, mehanizam tekst-u-govor pretvara tekst u zvuk.
Trebalo bi da imate aktivnu cloud pretplatu da biste koristili cloud usluge govora.
Kontrolišite sve vaše uređaje bilo Google Assistant ili Alexa uređaj.
Unesite ličnost u svoj dom tako što će razgovarati sa vama koristeći naše neuronske mreže koristeći usluge tekst-u-govor.
Do you want to expose {entities} entities to {assistants}?
Do you want to stop exposing {entities} entities to {assistants}?
Konfigurisano u YAML-u, ne može se uređivati u UI
ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Automatizacije
ui.panel.config.automation.description: Kreiranje prilagođenih pravila ponašanja za vaš dom
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Uređivač automatizacija vam omogućava da kreirate i uređujete automatizacije. Molimo, sledite dole navedenu vezu da biste pročitali uputstva, kako bi ste se uverili da ste ispravno konfigurisali Home Assistant-a.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_aut: Nismo mogli da nađemo nikakve automatizacije
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.only_e: Only automations in automations.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.dev_on: Only automations that have a unique ID assigned are debuggable.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.read_o: This automation cannot be edited from the UI, because it is not stored in the automations.yaml file, or doesn't have an ID.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.missin: Cannot save automation without a name
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.traces: Automations need an ID for history to be tracked. Add an ID to your automation to make it available in traces.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.load_e: Only automations in automations.yaml are editable.
Only automations in automations.yaml can be deleted.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.re_ord: You are in re-order mode, you can re-order your triggers.

ui.panel.config.script.caption: Skripte
ui.panel.config.script.picker.introducti: Uređivač skripti vam omogućava da kreirate i uređujete skripte. Pratite donju vezu da biste pročitali uputstva i da biste se uverili da ste ispravno konfigurisali Home Assistant.

ui.panel.config.script.editor.id_already: Ovu skriptu ne možete da sačuvate jer ID nije jedinstven, izaberite drugi ID ili ga ostavite praznog da biste ga automatski generisali.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.introducti: Koristite skripte da biste pokrenuli niz radnji.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.read_only: Ova skripta se ne može urediti iz korisničkog interfejsa jer nije sačuvana u fajlu ''scripts.yaml''.

ui.panel.config.scene.caption: Scene
ui.panel.config.scene.description: Snimite stanja uređaja i kasnije ih lako opozivite

ui.panel.config.scene.editor.load_error_: Samo scene u scenes.yaml se mogu uređivati.

ui.panel.config.scene.editor.devices.int: Dodajte uređaje koje želite da uključite u scenu. Postavite sve entitete na svakom uređaju na stanje koje želite za ovu scenu.
ui.panel.config.scene.editor.entities.in: Pojedinačni entiteti se mogu dodati ovde.
ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Kontrolišite dom kada ste odsutni i integrišite se sa Alexa i Google Assistant-om
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Prijavljivanje u klaudu
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: Home Assistant Cloud vam obezbeđuje bezbednu daljinsku vezu sa instancom dok ste odsutni od kuće. Takođe vam omogućava da se povežete sa uslugama samo za klaud: Amazon Alexa i Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant.
Home Assistant Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.learn_more_l: Learn more about Home Assistant Cloud
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: You need to change your password before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: You need to confirm your email before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.cloud_pipeli: Želite li da koristite Home Assistant Cloud za svog glasovnog asistenta?
Kreirali smo vam novog asistenta, koristeći superiorne tekst-u-govor i govor-u-tekst mehanizme iz Home Assistant Cloud. Želite li da postavite ovog pomoćnika kao željenog asistenta?
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Register Account
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Start your free trial
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with Home Assistant Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of Home Assistant Cloud, including:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of Home Assistant.
By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of Home Assistant Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.sign_out_c: Želite li zaista da se odjavite?
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for Home Assistant Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your Home Assistant instance publicly on the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tip_moved_: Looking for Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa settings? They are moved to the new voice assistants page.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.title: Text-to-speech
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.info: Bring personality to your home by having it speak to you by using our text-to-speech services. You can use this in automations and scripts by using the {service} service.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.tts.dialog: Hello {name}, you can play any text on any supported media player!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Remote control is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.cer: Your certificate is loaded, waiting for validation.
There was an error generating the certificate, check your logs.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: Home Assistant Cloud obezbeđuje bezbednu daljinsku vezu sa vašom instancom dok ste odsutni od kuće.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Your instance is available at your
Your instance will be available at your
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for Home Assistant Cloud you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the Home Assistant skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.manu: Editing which entities are exposed via the UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.not_: Da biste mogli da koristite Aleksu, potrebno je da aktivirate veštinu kućnog asistenta za Aleksu u Aleksa aplikaciji.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.expo: Should new entities be exposed to Alexa automatically? Exposes supported devices that are not classified as security devices.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for Home Assistant Cloud, you'll be able to control all your Home Assistant devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.htt: Google uređaji neće moći da razgovaraju lokalno sa Home Assistant-om jer ste konfigurisali SSL sertifikat za vašu HTTP integraciju.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the Home Assistant Cloud skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, Home Assistant will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This speeds up voice commands and allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a PIN to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors, and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this PIN when interacting with security devices via Google Assistant.
Enter a PIN to use security devices
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.man: Editing which entities are exposed via the UI is disabled because you have configured entity filters in configuration.yaml.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.not: Before you can use Google Assistant, you need to activate the Home Assistant Cloud skill for Google Assistant in the Google Home app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.exp: Should new entities be exposed to Google Assistant automatically? Exposes supported devices that are not classified as security devices.

ui.panel.config.entities.caption: Entiteti
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.introduc: Home Assistant keeps a registry of every entity it has ever seen that can be uniquely identified. Each of these entities will have an entity ID assigned which will be reserved for just this entity.
Use the entity registry to override the name, change the entity ID or remove the entry from Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.enable_s: This will make them available in Home Assistant again if they are now disabled.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.disable_: Disabled entities will not be added to Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.remove_s: You should remove them from your dashboard config and automations if they contain these entities.

You can only remove {removable} of the selected {selected} entities. Entities can only be removed when the integration is no longer providing the entities. Sometimes you have to restart Home Assistant before you can remove the entities of a removed integration. Are you sure you want to remove the removable entities?
ui.panel.config.entities.picker.hide_sel: Skriveni entiteti neće biti prikazani na kontrolnoj tabli. Njihova istorija se još uvek prati i još uvek možete da komunicirate sa njima sa uslugama.

ui.panel.config.zone.caption: Zone
ui.panel.config.zone.description: Upravljanje zonama u kojima želite da pratite osobe
ui.panel.config.zone.introduction: Zone vam omogućavaju da navedete određene regione na Zemlji. Kada se osoba nalazi u zoni, stanje će uzeti naziv iz zone. Zone se takođe mogu koristiti kao okidač ili uslov unutar podešavanja automatizacije.
ui.panel.config.zone.no_zones_created_ye: Izgleda da još uvek niste dodali nijednu zonu.
ui.panel.config.zone.confirm_delete: Da li ste sigurni da želite da izbrišete ovu zonu?
ui.panel.config.zone.configured_in_yaml: Zone konfigurisane putem configuration.yaml se ne mogu uređivati putem korisničkog interfejsa.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone: Radijus zone kuće se još uvek ne može uređiati sa frontend-a. Prevucite marker na mapi da biste pomerili kućnu zonu.
ui.panel.config.zone.edit_home_zone_narr: Radijus kućne zone se još uvek ne može uređiati sa frontend-a. Lokacija se može promeniti iz opšte konfiguracije.
ui.panel.config.zone.go_to_core_config: Želite li da pređite na opštu konfiguraciju?
ui.panel.config.zone.home_zone_core_conf: Lokacija kućne zone se može uređivati sa stranice opšte konfiguracije. Radijus kućne zone još uvek ne može uređiati sa frontend-a. Da li želite da pređete na opštu konfiguraciju?
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.name: Naziv
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.icon_error_m: Ikone bi trebalo da budu u formatu 'prefix:iconname', npr. 'mdi:home'
ui.panel.config.zone.detail.passive_note: Pasivne zone su skrivene u frontend delu i ne koriste se kao lokacija za praćenje uređaja. Ovo je korisno samo ako želite da je koristite za automatizaciju.
ui.panel.config.integrations.caption: Integracije
ui.panel.config.integrations.description: Upravljanje integracijama sa uslugama ili uređajima
ui.panel.config.integrations.no_integrat: Seems like you don't have any integrations configured yet. Click on the button below to add your first integration!
ui.panel.config.integrations.note_about_: No integrations matched your search, the integration you want to set up might not be available to set up via the UI yet.
ui.panel.config.integrations.rename_dial: Edit the name of this config entry
ui.panel.config.integrations.ignore.conf: Da li ste sigurni da ne želite da podesite ovu integraciju? Ovo se može poništiti tako što ćete kliknuti na 'Prikaži ignorisane integracije' u gornjem desnom meniju u uglu.
Ovo će učiniti da se integracija ponovo pojavi u otkrivenim integracijama kada bude otkrivena. Ovo može zahtevati ponovno pokretanje ili potrajati neko vreme.
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_entr: Da li želite da uklonite i akreditive aplikacije za ovu integraciju?

Ako ih uklonite, moraćete ponovo da unesete akreditive prilikom ponovne podešavanja integracije. Ako ih zadržite, oni će se automatski koristiti prilikom ponovnog podešavanja integracije ili će im se moći pristupiti iz menija Akreditivi aplikacije.
Saznajte više o akreditivima za aplikacije
Njegovi uređaji i entiteti će biti trajno izbrisani.
Omogući vođenje evidencije o otklanjanju grešaka
Ponovo pokrenite Home Assistant da biste završili uklanjanje ove integracije
Ponovo pokrenite Home Assistant da biste završili ponovno učitavanje ove integracije
Ponovo pokrenite Home Assistant da biste završili onemogućavanje ove integracije
Ponovo pokrenite Home Assistant da biste završili omogućavanje ove integracije

Omogućavanje ili onemogućavanje integracije nije uspelo
Automatsko anketiranje za ažurirane podatke je onemogućeno
Omogućeno vođenje evidencije o otklanjanju grešaka
ui.panel.config.integrations.config_flow: Ovaj uređaj se ne može dodati iz korisničkog interfejsa

Ovaj korak zahteva da posetite spoljnu veb lokaciju da biste završili.
Sačekajte, pokreće se čarobnjaka za konfigurisanje {integration}

ui.panel.config.users.add_user.caption: Dodaj korisnika
Manage the OAuth Application Credentials used by Integrations

OAuth is used to grant Home Assistant access to information on other websites without giving a passwords. This mechanism is used by companies such as Spotify, Google, Withings, Microsoft, and Twitter.
Setting up {integration} requires configuring application credentials.
Public identifier of the OAuth application
Application Credentials in use by an integration may not be removed.
ui.panel.config.mqtt.title: MQTT
ui.panel.config.thread.no_preferred_netw: You don't have a preferred network yet.
ui.panel.config.thread.no_routers_otbr_n: No border routers where found, maybe the border router is not configured correctly. You can try to reset it to the factory settings.
ui.panel.config.thread.confirm_reset_bor: This will reset the Home Assistant border router to its factory defaults and form a new Thread network. The old network may no longer be available, and any devices that were attached to this network may need to be recomissioned.
ui.panel.config.thread.confirm_set_datas: This will reconfigure the Home Assistant border router to use a different Thread network. The old network may no longer be available, and any devices that were attached to this network may need to be recomissioned.
ui.panel.config.thread.otbr_config_faile: Failed to configure the border router
ui.panel.config.thread.confirm_delete_da: This network will be removed from Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.zha.configuration_page.c: Zigbee and Thread share the same radio and must use the same channel. Change the channel of both networks by reconfiguring multiprotocol from the hardware menu.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.pair: Uverite se da su vaši uređaji u režimu uparivanja. Proverite uputstva na svom uređaju kako da to uradite.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Uređaji će se pojaviti ovde kada se otkriju.
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.no_d: Nije pronađen nijedan uređaj, uverite se da su u režimu uparivanja i držite ih budnim dok Home Assistant pretražuje.

ui.panel.config.zha.change_channel_dialo: Zigbee channel migration is an experimental feature and relies on devices on your network to support it. Device support for this feature varies and only a portion of your network may end up migrating!
Devices will re-join the network over time. This may take a few minutes.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.intro: Manage your Z-Wave network and Z-Wave devices
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.dashboard.stati: Number of messages successfully sent to the controller
Number of messages successfully received by the controller
Number of messages from the controller that were dropped by the host
Number of outgoing messages that were dropped because they could not be sent
Number of messages that the controller did not accept
Number of collisions while sending a message to the controller
Number of transmission attempts where an ACK was missing from the controller
Number of transmission attempts where the controller response did not come in time
Number of transmission attempts where the controller callback did not come in time
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_statistics: # of commands successfully sent to the node
# of commands received from the node, including responses to sent commands
# of outgoing commands that were dropped because they could not be sent
# of commands from the node that were dropped by the host
# of Get-type commands where the node's response did not come in time
Average round-trip-time in ms of commands to this node
Average RSSI in dBm of frames received by this node
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.route_statistic: The used data rate for this route
Which nodes are repeaters for this route and their RSSI
The RSSI of the ACK frame received by the controller
The nodes between which the transmission failed most recently

ui.panel.config.zwave_js.node_config.set: The parameter change has been queued, and will be updated when the device wakes up.

The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.provisioned.con: Želite li zaista da onemogućite obezbeđenje za uređaj?
Ako otklonite uređaj, on neće biti dodat Home Assistant-u  kada se uključi. Ako je već dodat Home Assistant-u, uklanjanje obezbeđenog uređaja neće ga ukloniti iz Home Assistant-a.

ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.int: Remove a device from your Z-Wave network, and remove the associated device and entities from Home Assistant.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.con: Your Z-Wave controller is now in exclusion mode.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.fol: Follow the directions that came with your device to trigger exclusion on the device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_node.exc: The device could not be removed. Please check the logs for more information.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.remove_failed_n: Remove a failed device from your Z-Wave network. Use this if you are unable to exclude a device normally because it is broken.
The device removal is in progress.
Device {id} has been removed from your Z-Wave network.
The device could not be removed from your Z-Wave network.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.reinterview_nod: Re-interview a device on your Z-Wave network. Use this feature if your device has missing or incorrect functionality.
You will need to wake battery powered devices before starting the re-interview. Refer to your device's manual for instructions on how to wake the device.
You can close this dialog and the interview will continue in the background.
The device is being interviewed. This may take some time.
The device interview failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Start a network heal on your Z-Wave network. A network heal will cause all devices to re-calculate their routes back to the controller and is recommended if you have recently moved devices or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.tr: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.in: Network healing is in progress. This will take some time.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.ru: You can close this dialog and the network healing will continue in the background.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_network.he: Healing failed. Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.title: Heal a Z-Wave Device
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.intro: Tell {device} to update its routes back to the controller. This can help with communication issues if you have recently moved the device or your controller.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.traff: The healing process generates a large amount of traffic on the Z-Wave network. This may cause devices to respond slowly (or not at all) while the heal is in progress.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.heali: Additional information may be available in the logs.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.heal_node.netwo: A Z-Wave network heal is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before healing an individual device.
ui.panel.config.zwave_js.update_firmware: WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your device if you do not correctly follow the manufacturer's guidance. The Home Assistant and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your device as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your device. Would you still like to continue?

WARNING: Firmware updates can brick your controller if you do not use the right firmware files, or if you attempt to stop the firmware update before it completes. The Home Assistant and Z-Wave JS teams do not take any responsibility for any damages to your controller as a result of the firmware update and will not be able to help you if you brick your controller. Would you still like to continue?
Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}.
Select the firmware file you would like to use to update {device}. Note that once you start a firmware update, you MUST wait for the update to complete.
Select the firmware target (0 for the Z-Wave chip, ≥1 for other chips if they exist) for this update.
The firmware update is ready to be sent to {device} but the device is asleep, wake the device to start the update.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue to be queued in the background and start automatically once the device wakes up.
The firmware update should start being sent to {device} shortly.
If you close this dialog, the update will continue in the background.
The firmware update on {device} is in progress ({progress}%).
Are you sure you want to abort the firmware update on {device}?
To attempt the firmware update again, select the new firmware file you would like to use.
The firmware update is complete! If you want to attempt another firmware update on this device, please wait until it gets re-interviewed.
The firmware update is complete! Your controller is being restarted and your network will temporarily be unavailable.

ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.descrip: You are currently using ''{current_path}'' as data disk. Moving the data disk will reboot your device and it's estimated to take {time} minutes. Your Home Assistant installation will not be accessible during this period. Do not disconnect the power during the move!
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.no_devi: There is no suitable external device found. The storage capacity of the external data disk must be larger than the storage capacity of the existing disk
ui.panel.config.storage.datadisk.moving_: Rebooting and moving data disk. Please have patience
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.n: The operating system does not support network storage
Network storage is not supported on this host
To use network storage you need to run at least Home Assistant Operating System {version}
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.o: Name
This name will be shown to you in the UI, and will also be the name of the folder created on your system
Remote share
This is the name of the share you created on your storage server
Server
This is the domain name (FQDN) or IP address of the storage server you want to connect to
Default backup location
This will be the default location for backups
Remote share path
This is the path of the remote share on your storage server
Protocol
This determines how to communicate with the storage server
Usage
This determines how the share is intended to be used
Samba/Windows (CIFS) version
This choses the version of the protocol to use
Username
This is your username for the samba share
Password
This is your password for the samba share
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.e: Invalid name, can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores
ui.panel.config.storage.network_mounts.w: The selected CIFS version is not recommended to use, you should only use this if you have problems with auto and your server does not support version 2.1 or newer
ui.panel.config.system_health.caption: System Health
ui.panel.config.system_health.descriptio: Status, metrics and integration startup time
